channel.title: Lab 1 on Ben Snow's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lab 1 on Ben Snow's Blog

item.title: End to end pipeline
item.description: 05/10/2022 Lab 1 End to end pipeline #machinelearning #course #hopsworks #serverless #gradio We’re looking at lab 1 of the Serverless-ML course today. Make sure to check out their website and their Github repository and give them a star! A link to my fork of the repo is here if you wish to follow along with my notebooks! Introduction Following on from Module 0 labs we are now going to look into deploying an actual machine learning product to the web!

item.title: Refactoring the pipeline
item.description: 06/10/2022 Refactoring Our little web app in the previous article is nice but it’s quite rigid in structure, very reliant on the notebook, doesn’t allow for new data to be added, and can’t work standalone. Let’s take some steps to refactor this pipeline and deploy it in a better way. The new architecture for the pipeline we wish to implement will look like this ! Fig 1.
